attacks.name: Crippling Strike
attacks.description: Attack for 90%. Inflict a 50% Slow for 2 turns and a 100% Bleed.

attacks.name: Disrupting Stab
attacks.description: Attack for 150%. Removes Enemy buffs. Enemy can't receive buffs for 3 turns.

attacks.name: Wide Slash
attacks.description: Gain +30% Evasion for 1 turn. Then, attack in an arc (2 attacks) for 100% each.

attacks.name: True Strike
attacks.description: Guaranteed hit for 150% + 25-50% of the Enemy's Damage Resistance.

attacks.name: Counterattack
attacks.description: Block all incoming attacks for 2 turns. Then, after 3.6s, perform a counterattack for 80%, and inflict a 20% Slow for 1 turn.

attacks.name: Pommel Bash
attacks.description: Attack for 120%, inflicting Daze for 3 turns on hit.

tooltipSpans.value: Immune to Curses, Fear, Poison, and Sleep.
+50% resistance against Melee and Ranged attacks from non-silver weapons and ammunition.
Your attacks deal double damage to silver-vulnerable monsters.
Your armour reflects a small portion of the damage dealt by silver-vulnerable monsters.
Takes double damage from silver weapons and ammunition.

combatPassives.name: Lycanthrope
combatPassives.customDescription: +50% resistance against Melee and Ranged attacks from non-silver weapons and ammunition.

Passive: (MELEE ONLY) While using Normal Damage, -0.08s Attack Interval, -5% Damage Reduction, +3 Melee Attack Bonus
(MELEE ONLY) Against monsters with vulnerability to silver, gain +5% Reflect Damage.

items.name: Dragon Dirk
items.customDescription: Passive: (MELEE ONLY) While using Normal Damage, -0.09s Attack Interval, -5% Damage Reduction, +3 Melee Attack Bonus

items.name: Silver Sword
items.customDescription: Deals extra damage to silver-vulnerable monsters.

items.name: Silver Sword
items.customDescription: Deals extra damage to silver-vulnerable monsters.

items.name: Spiritcaller Staff
items.customDescription:
Passive: Your attacks deal no damage while this is equipped. -10% Summoning Attack Interval and +100% Summoning Max Hit. +10% chance on Summon Attack to apply a random Elemental effect to the Enemy.
When equipped with the Book of Occults, gain +10% chance on Summon Attack to inflict a random Curse on the Enemy.

Unlock the ability to cut 3 different trees in Woodcutting. Logs, Skill XP and Mastery XP granted based on highest interval.
Unlock the ability to cut 4 different trees in Woodcutting. Logs, Skill XP and Mastery XP granted based on highest interval.

Using your current equipped food only, automatically consume the food to fill your Hitpoints to at least 90% when it is equal to or below 45% Hitpoints. Food Efficiency: 110% (Food heals for 110% of the value shown when Auto Eating).

Using your current equipped food only, automatically consume the food to fill your Hitpoints to at least 95% when it is equal to or below 42.5% Hitpoints. Food Efficiency: 115% (Food heals for 115% of the value shown when Auto Eating).
